search_results.snippet: The term "Five Civilized Tribes" derives from the colonial and early federal period. It refers to five Native American nationsthe Cherokee, Chickasaw, Choctaw, Creek (Muscogee), and Seminole.
search_results.title: Five Civilized Tribes - Wikipedia

search_results.snippet: The Five Civilized Tribes were a group of Native American nations that were officially and unofficially called such to collectively designate the Cherokee, Chickasaw, Choctaw, Creek, and Seminole tribes.
